html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: The Children's Ability Fund has been working with our loyal donors for more than 50 years to develop a greater understanding of the needs of people with disabilities throughout Edmonton and northern Alberta. With your help, we have been instrumental in providing assistance to hundreds of individuals and many groups and organizations. Over the last ten years more than 2 million dollars has been granted for equipment...

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
content: but the need continues and we need your help!

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: There are several ways you can contribute to the Children's Ability Fund

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
content: Participate in the Planned Giving Program

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span
content: Each year we ask our loyal donors to assist us with their continued support by making an annual contribution. With ongoing funding we are able to make a difference in the life of a person with a disability like Richardï¿½

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Hi! My name is Richard. You've never met me, but I'm one of the many people helped by the Children's Ability Fund. I am writing because I want to help this very special organization raise more money this year than ever before.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: When I was just one year old, I had a stroke. This left me with a brain injury and in a wheelchair. I cannot speak much at all - but I have so much to say! For 9 years I used a Touch Talker to help me communicate with my family and friends. After awhile it kept breaking down. I was so good at typing it couldn't keep up to me!

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: When I started high school. I was so nervous. I was going to be meeting new friends and wanted to make sure I could talk to them so they could get to know me.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: That's when I wrote to the Children's Ability Fund and asked them to help buy a new talking device. The one that I really liked was called the Delta Talker. I knew it would help me learn, meet new friends and become more independent.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Now so many great things have happened! I have my new talking device and have met many new friends at my school. I really enjoy visiting with them and I like to answer questions in class. My teachers say I am a good student, especially in science and math. This could not have happened without help from the Children's Ability Fund.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: They have helped so many people like me. Now, I want others to feel as great as I do. Please help them help others. Make a donation today. Your donation will make a big difference to others - just like it did for me.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Thank you for reading my letter. Maybe someday I can show you my new talker.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span
content: Some friends of the Children's Ability Fund chose to make a donation specifically to assist students with a disability. The Bursary Fund was established to ensure a continued commitment to providing an annual bursary to students in need through the Children's Ability Fund Bursary.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: In 1987, the Endowment Fund was established to ensure the continuity and longevity of the organization and its goals and to ensure that the resources would be available to meet the growing demand our economy has placed on non-profit organizations to provide funding for the necessary equipment to people with disabilities.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Our target is $5,000,000 and we are happy to report that we have reached the half way mark.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Donations made directly through the Endowment Fund and received through the

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: are invested and the resources are used to ensure the long-term financial stability of the Children's Ability Fund.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Cash donations are not the only way to contribute...

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td dir span
content: Donate a prize to be given away at one of our special events

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td dir span
content: Donate services to be used in house or given away as a prize

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td dir span
content: Start an employee/employer matching grant program

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td dir span
content: Offer employees paid time off to volunteer

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td dir span
content: Hold a fun company event and donate the proceeds

content: Participate in the Planned Giving... leave a long term gift.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p strong span
content: There are many ways to leave a lasting legacy like...

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p b span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Outright gifts - either of cash or other property - provide support for the Children's Ability Fund's programs for individuals and groups, like the Playground Project and the Bikes for Tykes Project.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: There are many ways of making outright gifts, they share a common characteristic, they can used as soon as the gift is made.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
content: Giving cash - whether by cheque, money order, credit card or currency - is the most familiar way to contribute to the Children's Ability Fund.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
content: Giving appreciated property like stocks and bonds is becoming a more widely used means of donating to a charity especially because of the favorable tax implications.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
content: Giving a gift of a Certified Cultural Property allows donors special tax considerations (there are also special guidelines that must be adhered to.)

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p b span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Many people who would like to make a gift to charity cannot afford to during their lifetime. There are other ways of ensuring that those charities that are dear to you will receive a donation on your behalf.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
content: Giving through your will. There are several alternatives for donating to a charity through your will; a general bequest, a specific bequest, a residual bequest designates, or a contingent bequest.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
content: Life Insurance. There are several ways to make a future gift to a charity through the purchase of a life insurance policy.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p b span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span
content: Gifts that provide lifetime income to a donor are a type of future gift. Some examples are:

html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td ul li span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Changes to the federal tax legislation have created more giving opportunities than ever before.
